content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Hello Mister Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I'm sure you'll find it to be a comfortable and convenient location.

Regarding the rental price, I am open to discussing it with you. However, I want to make it clear that I am a landlord and my primary goal is to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. I understand that you may have specific needs and expectations, but I will do my best to accommodate them while still achieving my objectives.

May I ask what type of tenant you are looking for and how long you plan to stay in Mannheim? This will help me determine a rental price that is fair and reasonable for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am a student. I want to rent the apartment for 1 year

I don't want to pay more than 700 Euros per month. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price.

I am very responsible and dependable. I always pay my rent on time and I take good care of the apartment.

I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I would like to hear your proposal.

Please give me some details about the apartment.

I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment. It should be located in Mannheim. It should be close to the university.

I would like to hear your proposal.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Mister Li. Based on your preferences, I propose a rental price of 650 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as your commitment to being a responsible and dependable tenant.

I am confident that you will find the apartment to be comfortable and conveniently located, close to the university. The apartment has been well-maintained and is in good condition, with all modern amenities included.

I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price, and I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable solution. However, I want to emphasize that I am a landlord and my primary goal is to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment.

If you are willing to accept my proposal of 650 Euros per month, I will prepare the necessary documents for you to sign. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I accept your proposal of 650 Euros per month. I will sign the documents tomorrow.

Thank you very much for your understanding and cooperation.
